resources.string: My name is Vanessa Castro, I am 20 years old and I am currently a Software Development and Administration student. It is my passion to give the best of myself to the world to make it a more enjoyable place for everyone through everything I do.
2 km from the town, find cabins for couples, groups and families. In the middle of nature, with a lake, stables and other attractions that will make your stay in Jardín an unforgettable memory.
The Hotel Diana is half a block from the park, on the road that connects the park with the Theater. It is a good, nice and cheap hotel! Free parking for guests motorcycles.
A family friendly hotel very well located. We are located on Calle del Medio, where you are close to the park but away from the noise. Attended by its owner!
A beautiful coffee farm, 12 minutes from town, with corridors, hammocks, a kiosk and a nice family that will welcome you at home!
Lunches - Menu of the day - Grilled meats
A pleasant place to enjoy good seasoning and the best of services.
National and International Food Restaurant. With a delicious gourmet menu, full bar with wines and spirits, cozy atmosphere, moderate prices and in the best location.
Address: Cra 5 #11 - 48 Jardin, Antioquia. Inside the Casa Passiflora Hotel
